effect.shortEffect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm. Protects against sandstorm damage.
effect.full: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon's rock-, ground-, and steel-type moves have 1.3× their base power. This Pokémon does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.

description.black-white: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
description.black-2-white-2: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
description.x-y: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
description.sun-moon: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
description.sword-shield: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
